channel.title: blog on Tomas McNamer
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Tomas McNamer

item.title: How does TLS work
item.description: How Does TLS Work Introduction Photo by Richy Great on Unsplash I’m sure we’ve all been told to make sure that our browser shows a little lock icon when visiting a website. You probably know that the “lock” means that your connection to the web server is secure, no one can read your passwords or credit card information except for you and the server. You also probably know that the “lock” represents HTTPS (with the S standing for “secure”), whereas the lack of a lock represents HTTP.

item.title: A Look Back on HTN 2021
item.description: A Look Back on HTN 2021 TL;DR We built an app that tracked people using security cameras in stores and won the Best Entrepreneurship Hack and Best Use of Google Cloud prizes. More information is available on our devpost. Introduction HackTheNorth is the biggest hackathon in Canada, with over 3500 participants and 447 projects submitted in 2021 on their devpost. Being the biggest Canadian hackathon, HTN provides participants with a plethora of mentors and workshops.

item.title: Markdown Formatting Demo
item.description: This example Markdown file compliments of markdown-it.github.io h1 Heading 8-) h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements Enable typographer option to see result.
